Text: You might want to check out your Limiter settings perhaps ? I have checked out a few of your rips/encodes so far and they all suffer from serious re-levelling a few seconds into each song. It's like the 'balls' are sucked right out of each track once the encoder gets a taste of incoming levels. It's really too bad, as you have done alot of work and I wouldn't archive any of your releases because of the problems. Thanks anyways though.
los demás discos en 24 bit porfaa!! (:
